main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects at Barksdale AFB by Air Force personnel on August 6, 1952, and August 2, 1952.
interesting points: The objects observed were described as 'comet' shaped., The sightings occurred during night hours., Witnesses included USAF crewmen and airmen., The observations noted high-speed movement followed by hovering., There was speculation that the objects may have been meteors or balloons.
